All Classes

Class Description
AppProperties
Helper class to store software properties.
AppWindow
Main class of OpenXRechnungToolbox.
CheckDigit
Check Digit calculation and validation.
CheckDigitException
Check Digit calculation/validation error.
CustomDropTargetAdapter
Class to define a custom drop target adapter.
CustomHelpSelectionAdapter
Helper class to implement a custom selection adapter for help page opening in external browser.
CustomSelectionAdapter
Class to define a custom selection adapter for file(s) selection dialog to process either the validation report or visualization.
CustomSettingsSaveListener
Class to define a custom save listener for settings file.
HTMLWindow
Class to create HTML browser window to display XRechnung HTML visualization as well as XRechnung validation tool HTML report.
IBANCheckDigit
IBAN (International Bank Account Number) Check Digit calculation/validation.
ILeitwegChecker
Interface for Leitweg-ID checker and calculator.
Internationalization  
IValidator
Interface defining the methods for XRechnung validation.
IVisualizer
Interface defining the methods for XRechnung visualization.
LeitwegCheckerImpl
Class to implement the Leitweg-ID validation/calculation (ILeitwegChecker interface).
LWIDWindow
Class to create Leitweg-ID checking/calculation window.
SettingsWindow
Class to create settings window.
UTF8Control
Class to handle encoding for properties/resource files.
ValidatorImpl
Class implementing the validation report processing (implements the IValidator interface).
VisualizerImpl
Class implementing the visualization processing (implements the IVisualizer interface).
